QuestData.Title: Sigil of Storms
QuestData.Description: <Someone with great knowledge of magic may be interested in studying a find such as this.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Sigil of Storms to Storm Hunter William in Stormwind.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver the Sigil of Storms to Storm Hunter William in Stormwind.
QuestData.RewardText:
This is outside of my league, magic-wise.
But I'll get it to Khadgar. Continue to push back the Primalist threat.
